text: 2.2 Apo 16.19-24, 17.1-9, Plp 1.30, Kol 2.1 Ñɨn anɨb ak taun Pilipay ned amonok, binɨb ogɨnap chɨnop takaw tɨmel agɨl gɨ tɨmel gɨlak ak pen, nɨb nepɨm, taun nɨbi Tesalonayka am God takaw teplep ne ak agñɨnok. Agñonok chɨnop gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨlak ak pen, God chɨn ak, ne chɨnop kod yek, gos anɨb ak ma nɨŋɨd, monmon agñɨnok.
